Miscellaneous Highlights: PNC Park is where the Pittsburgh Pirates (68-76) will try to defeat the Miami Marlins (54-90) on Wednesday.
The line on this matchup has the Marlins at +130 while the Pirates open at -155.
The starting pitchers will be Adam Mazur and Bailey Falter.
Pittsburgh Pirates hold an on-base percentage of.302 in addition to a batting average of.235 so far this year.
They have hit 210 two-baggers, while taking a walk 431 times and scoring 610 runs.
The Pittsburgh pitching staff have yielded 659 runs this season while holding a team ERA of 4.16 (592 earned runs conceded).
They have surrendered 152 home runs and they yield 4.63 runs per 9 innings (21st in MLB).
Others: Adam Mazur has a FIP of 7.48 while facing 158 batters during his time in the major leagues.
He has conceded 40 base knocks (10.8 hits per 9 innings) with 21 walks.
His ERA is 7.59 (28 ER's allowed) and he has a WHIP of 1.837.
Mazur has pitched in 33 frames and has totaled 22 strikeouts during his pro baseball career.
Falter has surrendered 336 hits while he has tallied 252 strikeouts in 319 innings.
Falter (17-21 win-loss mark in his career) holds a 4.66 ERA while giving up 9.5 hits per 9 innings.
He has given up 165 ER's while holding a WHIP of 1.303 and being the owner of a FIP of 4.6.
